attributes.action: to ban any audio broadcast that is to do the following
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
used in relation to drive asians from an area

create a false impression of a person for the benefit of a crime.

uses imaging based on sound.

use to cause harm to an individual using the broadcast as a sound attack on an individual - direct attacks on an individual due to their colour,religion, health and wealth

use the sound broadcast to get ppl to act on their behalf.

use the audio on any channel to cause religious attacks on a religion.

make the ppl in the general area of an attack a victim of crime.

murder of an individual and family members and their people of any race/religion.
